name: The Lost Beer
description:
"The story of a beer lost in space trying to make his way to Palmer Lucky, funder of Oculus Rift, with the dream to ask him a question: At when a customer release?"

A game where your names, your tweets are the game !

We want the game to be a kind of game credits for the contest we are going to live: Oculus Mobile Jam 2015. We want the backer of the IndieGoGo Campaign to be part of the game.

Please enjoy and share !
